title: paLLikkUDam vaittu
sahitya:
paLLikkUDam vaittu piLLaiku nidam pATham sholginrAnE parama guru


anupallavi

  veLLak-kaDal shUzhum vindai ulagamellAm teLLiya nUlAi en cintai ezhundu kOlAip-


caraNam 1    malarinilE uDal vAzhum vaghai kATTi vAna shuDarAl en manaviruLai OTTi
alaigaLilE guNa nilaigaLai nITTiyE anubhavattAl enai arivuravATTiyE
    caraNam 2    gavanam kuraindAlO kAdinaik-kiLLuvAn kaNakkup-pisaginAlO kaDaisiyil taLLuvAn
avanai arinduviTTAl Anandam koLLuvAn AsAn vElaiyum viTTu nEsanAit-tuLLuvAn
palukavE bangAru cilaka.  rAgamAlkA.  Adi tALA.  
caraNam 1  			(rAgA:  Anandabhairavi)Aa:S G2 R2 G2 M1 P D2 P N2 S  Av:  S N2 D2 P M1 G2 R2 S  palukavE bangAru cilaka Om paramAtma nAma mahima

 caraNam 2    imbukA palukavE cilaka mA hrdaya nivAsuni cilaka 
ambuja nAbhuni hari vAsudEvuni antarAtmuni saccidAnanda guruvuni 
 caraNam 3    kaNDlAra jUDavE cilaka I karuNA kaTASuNi cilaka
niNDu mugamulO paNDu vennalavela niradhishayAnanda bharita prabhAvambu
 caraNam 4  (rAgA:  kEdAra)Aa:S M1 G3 M1 P N3 S  Av:  S N3 P M1 G3 R2 S  sundara rUpamu prEma vAri suguNa hrdayambu prEma 
antarangAtmuDu bagiranga mugA mammunAlinganamu jEyunatishaya prEmanu 
 caraNam 5    sancita prArabdha karma manda jAri tolugunE cilaka 
manci sanmArgamununci kApADu mahAguru caitanya sannidhi mahimalu
 caraNam 6  			(rAgA:  kAmbhOji)Aa:S R2 G3 M1 P D2 S  Av:  S N2 D2 P M1 G3 R2 S N3 P D2 S  prEmanu vittavE cilaka ati perigi cigirincu cilaka 
rAma bhajananu pArinci pArinci jnAnamu puSpinci mOnamu paNDunu 
 caraNam 7    mOna samudramulOna manci mutyAla ratnAla cirabhim
Ananda tarangamu lADi jIva nAva adhyAtma shAntamunantunu jUDavE
 caraNam 8    matuvulO cImElu tOmalu bOlu mAyalO munukakA cilaka 
caduvulO carccalO samayavAdalO lEdu sadguru sEvalO sAyujyamunnatE 
 caraNam 9    agni kannavenna bOlu cilaka AdudAnimOka paTTi 
magnamai manujulu duhkka paTakuNDa manmatha bANamu laNDaga mAlpunu

gatilEni vArini karuNatO kaDatEra gati jUpi rakSinci kApADu guru shakti 
1caraNam 1    palu mATalendukE cilaka oka bangAru jUpEmA bhAgyam
kalugunu ihapara sahajavai bhOgambu gangA pravAhambu karuNA kaTAkSambu
